item.description:
***UPDATE:  Let's meet outside of The Old Spot pub (121 Essex Street Salem, MA) around 2:30.  http://www.theoldspot.com/  From there, we can walk to wherever.  I imagine it will be packed with people so please call me if you can't find us.  For those of you who don't know me, I'll be carrying a Meetup sign. *****

Let's get together and explore the city of Salem for Halloween this Saturday! I have never really celebrated Halloween (wasn't allowed to go trick or treating as a kid), but figure this would be the ultimate experience. It would have to be only a day trip for me as I have a dress rehearsal in the morning and concert in the evening, but whoever wants to go early and stay late could find rides with others to and fro.

I can fit 4 people in my car; we can meet up near my rehearsal area at BU  around 1:15-1:30; those who would like to ride with me can email me for details on where exactly to meet.  We would have to be back in town by 6:30 PM at the latest.  If you have a car and would like to carpool, please post in the comments.
item.name: Day trip to Salem for Halloween
